item.title: Video
item.description: 1 hour of natural play Mothers and infants will be recorded for an hour while they go about their daily activities. Dyadic play Mothers and infants will be recorded for 3 minutes while they play together with a toy. Solitary play Infants will be recorded for 3 minutes while they play with a toy. Home tour The experimenter will record a tour of the home narrated by the mother.
